name: @haygrouve/db-schema
description: Shared database schema for our projects

scripts.schema:update: npm run validate && npm run generate && npm run push
scripts.schema:publish: npm run schema:update && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run schema:publish
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run schema:publish
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run schema:publish

author: Tsvetomir Tsekov
